config.neo4j.cypher.topic.adults: MERGE (t:Accounts {fspiAgentAccountId: event.fspiAgentAccountId}) ON CREATE SET t += {fspiAgentAccountId: event.fspiAgentAccountId, accountId: event.accountId, fspiId: event.fspiId, fspiAgentId: event.fspiAgentId, accountType: event.accountType, memberName: event.memberName} ON MATCH SET t += {fspiAgentAccountId: event.fspiAgentAccountId, accountId: event.accountId, fspiId: event.fspiId, fspiAgentId: event.fspiAgentId, accountType: event.accountType, memberName: event.memberName}
